title.rendered: Akshay Kumar’s Advice To Tiger Shroff About ‘Disha’ Goes Viral

content.rendered:
The glamorous Holi season is here and Bollywood stars are adding color to Instagram, filling the platform with photos and videos from their celebrations. Dressed in white with white water and powder. They not only celebrate with their friends and company employees but also share these moments with their fans, spreading happiness and joy on social media.

One of them is Disha Patani who teamed up with her ex-boyfriend Tiger Shroff at Akshay Kumar’s house to celebrate Holi. Disha also shared a few snippets capturing some beautiful moments with Akshay. Many people in the comment section are wondering if Disha and Tiger are back together. “Happy to see Tiger and Disha together again,” one comment read. Another read: “It hurts me so much to make you both, Disha and Agha, busy. »

Then, in another video, Akshay comes out of his house, holding a water balloon in his hand. Meanwhile, Bade Tiger, his co-star in the film Bade Miyan Chote Miyan, is lurking near the door of his house in a colored bucket, holding his hand as Akshay threatens her with a water balloon. The following is a clean movie – Igbo, instead of the face of sulfur, decided howek and water beautiful!

But, lose, a Tiger family, continued to connect it with regularity to Krishna and Aesha Shrof. On the work front, Disha was last seen in Karan Johar’s Yodha. Which also stars Sidharth Malhotra and Raaashii Khanna in the lead. Apart from this, Disha also has Project K in her kitty.


News made headlines for a couple of years about dating rumors surrounding Disha Patani and Tiger Shroff before reports in 2022 confirmed that the two actors had parted ways. However, Disha, who was close to Tiger’s family. Maintained her bond with them and was often seen spending time with Krishna and Ayesha Shroff.


On the work front, Disha last appeared in Karan Johar’s Yodha, which also features Sidharth Malhotra and Raashii Khanna in the lead roles. Besides these, Disha also has Project K in her kitty.


Read Also: IPL 2024 Opening Ceremony: Akshay Kumar and Tiger Shroff give an electric performance
